project_abstract.cdata: The proposed credit would help finance: (a) the reconstruction and bituminous paving of the 180 miles Zomba-Lilongwe highway; (b) the engineering supervision thereof; (c) a study of Malawi's road transport regulations and road-rail coordination; and (d) the refunding of the highway engineering credit (S2-MAI) of October 4, 1966.
